PreceptDef.label: arranged
PreceptDef.description:
All romance attempts must be under the control of the whole society.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - Pawns with this precept will not attempt or accept romance naturally. 
 - You can control romance attempt in the right-click menu.

PreceptDef.label: forbidden
PreceptDef.description:
Everyone in our society should keep purely single.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - Pawns with this precept will not attempt or accept romance naturally.

PreceptDef.label: discouraged
PreceptDef.description:
Romance on the rim is dead.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - (Initiator)Romance attempt chance -50% 
 - (Recipient)Natural romance attempt success chance -50%.

PreceptDef.label: encouraged
PreceptDef.description:
Love is danger, love is pleasure.
Love is pure, the only treasure.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - (Initiator)Romance attempt chance +50% 
 - (Recipient)Natural romance attempt success chance +50%.
